body.p: The undersigned Citizens of Henry County would represent to yr Excellency -- that some 3 or 4 years ago a man named M. Moneham and his Wife Moneham fell out & quarrelled -- that his wife had her case heard before a Justice & said M Moneham had to give security to appear before the Circt Ct -- that Madison Ireland & W M. Brown Went into the recognizance -- that the recognizance was forfeited that Sums issued & Judgt was rendered therein agt said Mad Ireland & W M Brown now in the hands of Shff on Judgt for $50 -- & Costs. that the said M Monham and his Wife very Shortly after the recognizance was entered into made up all their difficulties & lived together & have since gone as man & wife and are now in peace -- They were both of foreign birth. that the Comwelth is satisfied in this respect -- The defts in say that they were ignorant as to the law of the case & ignorant of the Judgt untill the Shff the other day called on them for payt of -- We believe and are satisfied the fine should be remitted. The defts have helpless families & want all they can made to support them. We state that We are well acquainted With the above facts. Decr 3 1862.
